body.name: ROSYCORAL Women’s Seamless Bikini Panties Soft Stretch Invisibles Briefs No Show Hipster Underwear cheeky 9 pack XS-L
features: No Show Bikini Panties: [Waist Measurements]: XS = 24 - 25"; S = 26 - 27"; M = 28-29" ; L= 30-32". [Hip Measurements]: XS= 33-34"; S = 35-36" ; M= 37-38" ; L = 39-41".

Seamless Underwewr: This ROSYCORAL underwear provides a seamless and no show no ride up look, which can take you through your workout and into the rest of the day comfortably, and our super soft and breathable material that stay dry and in place, you will forget they’re even there.
Womens Invisible Cheeky: Made with super soft smooth fabrics (90% Nylon and 10% Spandex) and created with a two-way stretch that moves with you,plus flatters your curves.

V Cut Hipster: These 9 pack low rise and no show panties created with a V cut design that sit below your belly without digging into your skin. It’s great for you to wear under legging or dress, even when you are pregnant.

Womens Underwear: ROSYCORAL measurement results might different from amazon's. Please kindly refer to the size chart showed on the product image. Just choose the most appropriate size to get more comfortable style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Great set of colorful undies that don't leave you feeling like you're wearing granny panties. No fabric crawling up your butt during a long day...super comfortable and stylish. If you want something sleek, comfortable, no panty lines, at a good price these are it ladies! Who says you have to sacrifice comfort for style? I would definitely buy these again and are "true to size" based on the normal underwear size I purchase for other brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes yes yes ! Especially if pregnant
reviews.reviewText: This was an impulse purchase when I became pregnant for the first time and started gaining weight that I was not used to having.I used to wear thongs as they were the best no show underwear, and being skinny I had very little irritation with the “wedgie” situation.After gaining some weight and not being able to handle the feeling of my old underwear, these were an effort to be more comfortable.And omg I’m so glad I got these. They are comfortable and stretchy, even through gaining weight and ordering my initial size (small-extra small) I was able to wear these comfortably throughout my entire pregnancy even after gaining almost 80 pounds and jumping up a few pant sizes.Downside would be having to hang dry these versus throwing them in the dryer with everything else.I can tell the difference immediately, the ones exclusively hand dried have lasted amazingly, and I can easily tell which ones accidentally got snuck into the dryer. All still have held up well, but the dryer ones look older than the hang dried ones.I enjoyed how many came in this pack and they’ve lasted me over a year thus far and I’ve been contemplating ordering more just to have extras.I will admit that while they are mostly seamless, it will depend on how tight your clothing is and if you are able to smooth them out under the fabric. Tighter clothes will challenge the seamless factor, but again subject to the tightness and the fabric of what you’re wearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't stay tight
reviews.reviewText: These are comfortable and fit when first put on. They are no-show/seamless. As the day wears on, they lose their elasticity and don't stay in place. They bunch and shift.You'd have better luck sizing down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best undies I've ever worn
reviews.reviewText: I've been a thong girl since I turned 18, but recently the thongs have been irritating my.... well use your imagination. I just can't get behind a full brief because I can't handle the panty lines, so a cheeky seemed the way to go. The ROSYCORAL Women’s Seamless Bikini Panties are perfect. They don't go so far up your butt that they irritate sensitive areas, and they don't leave panty lines. The V shape of the front is really flattering. The seams are flat and don't leave marks. You feel like you barely have any panties on! They have a soft gusset in the crotch for more thickness there. I will say, a panty liner sticks like super glue, not going anywhere. I've been hanging them up to dry to extend the life, and they dry very quickly so you could hand wash as well. Such a great deal for some great undies. I am 5'7" and 155 pounds, a little hippy but with a little bit of a flat butt. The medium fits me perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually just placed another order for these panties as I had a previous order I loved. Feels like high dollar panties. They are so soft, seamless (no panty line) and overall awesome. I'll definitely continue buying from Rosycoral. Great products, quality & price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stretch out tremendously during the day!
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed with how much these underwear stretch out throughout the day. After just a couple hours of wearing them they start to fall down. They definitely are comfortable when you first put them on, but I would not recommend purchasing these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and feel amazing!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these underwear. They are truly cheeky, they do not show through leggings, and they stretch while feel amazing! I would buy these again without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit concerned about the panties when I first put them on. No seems means no bottom ends on the legs they are cut a bit higher than I imagined, and I was uncomfortable about the cut. ( although my assets or the first part of that word my just be extra large). Once I put my pants on I fell in love. I feel as if I am wearing nothing. Soft as a glove. Light as a feather perfection in every way.Easily the most comfortable underthings I have worn. 10 out of five stars!
